contact-title: Get in touch to get started!
confirmation: An email with your company details have been sent to our reps.
error: An error occured with our mailing service... please email these details manually.
portal-info: Our community is exponentially growing! By using our platform as a service, businesses can gain market share, increase brand recognition, and generate valuable feedback from shoppers on their health food products. Suppliers can gain access to our back-end where they can manage their orders, invoices, and products.
control-over-your-brand-subtext: List, price, and edit your product listings as often as you like. Keep your brand's image up-to-date by managing your products, building variety packs, offering promotions and so much more... with Way Too Good.
participate: Participate in our subscription box program
participate-subtext: Participate in our health food subscription box program to receive immediate exposure of your new products in thousands of homes. Give your brand the attention and feedback it deserves.
direct-to-consumer-subtext: With our third-party marketplace, you can sell directly to the end consumer without having to offer wholesale prices.
engaging-review-subtext: With our interactive and engaging review and rating system, consumers will feel more confident to buy and try. The platform is excellent for spreading your brand awareness and collecting feedback about your products.
new-marketplace-subtext: The title speaks for itself. Join the Waytoogood community as we grow our next generation marketplace.
control-over-brand: ~ Control over your brand - List, price and edit your product listings
have-products-featured: ~ Have products featured in the Wbox program
assist-in-managing: ~ WayTooGood reps assist in managing listings
support-team-subtext: Our knowledgeable support team is always ready to help.
